message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500. I think this is a great deal, considering the value it will bring to you. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7200. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the value it will bring to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $6500. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $6900. This is as low as I can go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the value it will bring to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $6500. Can you consider that?
